definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
need not/does not have to/not necessarily
to be bound to/to be sure to
must/to need to/to be sure to

sentences.english: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
sentences.chinese: 然而你們連一根頭髮，也必不損壞。

sentences.english: But those who plan what is good find love and faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 謀善的，必得慈愛和誠實。

sentences.english: Whoever flees at the sound of terror will fall into a pit;
sentences.chinese: 躲避恐懼聲音的必墜入陷坑。

sentences.english: If the scourge slay suddenly, he will laugh at the trial of the innocent.
sentences.chinese: 若忽然遭殺害之禍，他必戲笑無辜的人遇難。

sentences.english: But there are trade-offs, and cloud computing is not without its warts.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有得必有失，雲計算並非沒有缺點。

sentences.english: Bow and sword and battle I will abolish from the land, so that all may lie down in safety.
sentences.chinese: 又必在國中折斷弓刀，止息爭戰，使他們安然躺臥。

sentences.english: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass.
sentences.chinese: 祂必降臨，像雨降在已割的草地上。

sentences.english: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 我恨惡惡人的會，必不與惡人同坐。

sentences.english: The revenger of blood himself shall slay the murderer: when he meeteth him, he shall slay him.
sentences.chinese: 報血仇的必親自殺那故殺人的，一遇見就殺他。

sentences.english: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
sentences.chinese: 到那時候，凡求告主名的，就必得救。

sentences.english: We must also discover "others" and the intersubjective world.
sentences.chinese: 我們必鬚髮現“他者”和主體間性的世界。

sentences.english: You must now generate some events to see data in the dashboard.
sentences.chinese: 您現在必鬚生成一些事件，以在儀表板中查看數據。

sentences.english: As the Scripture says, "Anyone who trusts in him will never be put to shame."
sentences.chinese: 經上說，凡信他的人，必不至於羞愧。

sentences.english: But whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.
sentences.chinese: 惟有聽從我的，必安然居住，得享安靜，不怕災禍。

sentences.english: And Nathan said unto David, The LORD also hath put away thy sin; thou shalt not die.
sentences.chinese: 拿單說，耶和華已經除掉你的罪，你必不至於死。

sentences.english: He will eat curds and honey when he knows enough to reject the wrong and choose the right.
sentences.chinese: 到他曉得棄惡擇善的時候，他必喫奶油與蜂蜜。

definition: to be bound to/to be sure to
